vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.21.19;
son of: Jaare-oregim (H3296)
§ Elhanan = "God has been gracious"
1) Jair's son who fought the Gittites
2) Dodo's son who was a chief of David
vocabinfos._es_Definition: guerrero(s); en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伊勒哈難 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神已經施恩典"
1) 睚珥 (雅雷俄珥金) 的兒子, 曾和迦特人作戰 (撒下 21:19; 代上 20:5)
2) 朵多的兒子, 是大衛王手下的勇士之一 (撒下 23:24; 代上 11:26)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
伊勒哈难 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神已经施恩典"
1) 睚珥 (雅雷俄珥金) 的儿子, 曾和迦特人作战 (撒下 21:19; 代上 20:5)
2) 朵多的儿子, 是大卫王手下的勇士之一 (撒下 23:24; 代上 11:26)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.24;
son of: Dodo (H1734I)
§ Elhanan = "God has been gracious"
1) Jair's son who fought the Gittites
2) Dodo's son who was a chief of David
